geocode_en.formatted_address: 106 Portland St, Mong Kok, Hong Kong

result.adr_address: 106 Portland St, Mong Kok, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 106 Portland St, Mong Kok, Hong Kong
result.name: Amour Corner

reviews.text:
We order a standard dinner set
The price are reasonable but the food quality are not that good
The spaghetti was a bit salty and a bit undercook

Great little find and we opted for the set menu... We weren't overly impressed by the first couple courses but I'll give the rundown.

We started it off with the cheese and foie gras; the cheese starter wasn't half bad but could definitely do with crackers other than saltines. As for the foie gras, I probably went in with rather high expectations only to have them shatter as it touched my tongue. It was overcooked and lacked flavour making the experience rather pointless.

We then moved on to the soup and salad. For the former it appeared that they had used the sauce from canned spaghetti as a base and forgotten to add anything else. As for the salad, it was primarily lettuce but was definitely a pleasant reprieve from the soup.

On to the main event, the lamb (I'd been missing this since I left South Africa) and was honestly pleasantly surprised. It was cooked to perfection, the mash was smooth and I was most content. Can't say the gravy did all that much and tasted far too much like instant gravy but it reminded me of home and my mother's cooking as a child.

Finally, this was completed with a lovely panacotta with a berry jus which was a wonderfully fresh end to the evening. While it definitely wasn't perfect, the lamb and panacotta hit the spot and at the less than $200 dollars a person its definitely worth trying... but maybe go straight to mains
Just above average. working day dinner is good because doesn't need to wait
Pretty great atmosphere for dinner with friends.

Walked into the restaurant lunchtime on a Saturday and it was empty, which didn't fill us with much confidence. The décor seemed old and dark. The menus had items which when requested were not available.
Food was unexpectedly tasty, and definitely great value for money. A steak, beer, pasta and lemon water for $200
Wouldn't go back, but it's good for a quick meal at a good price.

result.adr_address: 香港旺角砵蘭街106號
result.name: Amour Corner

reviews.text:
環境尚可，服務差，食物還好。
服務真係好差，問都唔問就將食物收走。
收碟時，很大力摔碟。
一定唔會再去。
味道okay, 價錢抵既西餐廳，坐得都舒服
菜色不錯，就是地方比較窄
二人套餐加半打蠔，有餐湯有沙津有餐飲，頭盤有鵝肝多士帕爾瑪火腿真心抵食！各樣食物都不錯，中規中矩，係意大利飯味道爭少少，加多兩粒鹽會好啲，埋單兩個人加埋$500無得輸。

抵食生蠔拼盤，二人套餐👍🏾

同小妹去旺角睇戲，
睇戲之前就從openrice搵到呢到有間不錯嘅西餐廳—「Amour Corner」，
見到佢二人套餐都幾抵，所以就試下！😏

我地仲額外點左個生蠔食，
$128就有6隻3款不同國家嘅生蠔，
都抵喎！😎

是日生蠔有加拿大🇨🇦、美國🇺🇸、法國🇫🇷，
加拿大生蠔肉質清爽，比較淡嘅海水味，
美國嘅海水味相對比較重，
而法國的就較為Creamy，
雖然有提供調味料，
但生蠔都算新鮮嘅關係，
所以唔洗落任何調味，都可以品嘗到佢嘅鮮味，無多餘嘅怪腥味。😏

至於套餐，我地揀左比較實惠但性價比高嘅「經典二人晚餐」。
頭盤：巴馬火腿蜜瓜、青蘋果🍏鵝肝多士
湯、沙律：傳統凱撒沙律、是日餐湯
主菜：烤澳洲牛柳扒、黑松露菌意大利飯
兩位$328，
仲包甜品和餐飲，真係超值！👍🏾

巴馬火腿蜜瓜
蜜瓜都算鮮甜，巴馬火腿鹹香，不錯吃！
青蘋果🍏鵝肝多士
多士烤得香脆可口，鵝肝肥美，
青蘋果嘅清爽剛好可以一解鵝肝嘅肥膩感。😉

傳統凱撒沙律，清甜爽脆，
麵包粒又夠脆！👍🏾
雜菜湯不過不失吧。

烤澳洲牛柳扒
叫左medium rare，
熟成度拿捏得剛好，還有肉汁滲透出來，不錯啊！😋
旁邊嘅伴菜新鮮多汁，薯蓉creamy。

黑松露菌意大利飯
意大利飯軟硬適中，食落幾有嚼勁，
還有菇菌嘅完美配搭，黑松露味都算突出，
不錯吃！

是日甜品係奶凍，都幾香滑☺️。
